meanings.definition: A small, long-bodied invertebrate with many legs, belonging to the class Diplopoda.
meanings.sent1: I saw a group of millipeds crawling on the forest floor.
meanings.sent2: The millipeds scurried away when I approached them.
meanings.sent3: The millipeds had a race to see who could reach the leaf first.
meanings.sent4: The millipeds moved in unison, resembling a tiny marching band.
meanings.sent5: Counting the legs of a millipeds can be a fun challenge for kids.

meanings.sent1: There were so many millipeds in the garden after the rain.
meanings.sent2: The millipeds were carefully collected for the science project.
meanings.sent3: The millipeds threw a party to celebrate their large numbers.
meanings.sent4: The garden was alive with the sound of millipeds moving around.
meanings.sent5: The millipeds seemed to form a never-ending line across the path.
